Package com.cscie97.store.controller

Class AssistCustomerCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscie97.store.controller.AbstractCommand
      • com.cscie97.store.controller.AssistCustomerCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand, java.util.concurrent.Callable<Event>
    public class AssistCustomerCommand
extends AbstractCommand
    When a customer carries more than 10lbs, he may call for assistance. However, this command takes individuals with disabilities into consideration and anyone can ask for assistance
    Author:
    Tofik Mussa

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Event execute()
        The first robot nearby is told the weight of the basket and is sent to assist customer. An extension is the turnstile will open for both the customer and the robot so they can leave store
        Returns:
        - an assist customer type event
